Class AdminImpl

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.admin.AdminImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Admin, JobExecutor
public class AdminImpl extends Object implements Admin
AdminImpl receives administrative jobs for a worker.
Author:
Greg Haines

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminImpl

      public AdminImpl(Config config)
      Create a new AdminImpl which subscribes to ResqueConstants.ADMIN_CHANNEL, registers the PauseCommand and ShutdownCommand jobs, and creates a new Jedis connection.
      Parameters:
      config - the Jesque configuration

    • AdminImpl

      public AdminImpl(Config config, Set<String> channels, JobFactory jobFactory)
      Create a new AdminImpl which creates a new Jedis connection.
      Parameters:
      config - the Jesque configuration
      channels - the channels to subscribe to
      jobFactory - the job factory that materializes the jobs

    • AdminImpl

      public AdminImpl(Config config, Set<String> channels, JobFactory jobFactory, Jedis jedis)
      Create a new AdminImpl.
      Parameters:
      config - the Jesque configuration
      channels - the channels to subscribe to
      jobFactory - the job factory that materializes the jobs
      jedis - the connection to Redis

    • join

      public void join(long millis) throws InterruptedException
      Wait for this JobExecutor to complete. A timeout of 0 means to wait forever. This method will only return after a thread has called JobExecutor.end(boolean).
      Specified by:
      join in interface JobExecutor
      Parameters:
      millis - the time to wait in milliseconds
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if any thread has interrupted the current thread

    • execute

      protected Object execute(Job job, String curQueue, Object instance) throws Exception
      Executes the given job.
      Parameters:
      job - the job to execute
      curQueue - the queue the job came from
      instance - the materialized job
      Returns:
      the result of the job execution
      Throws:
      Exception - if the instance is a Callable and throws an exception

    • getReconnectAttempts

      protected int getReconnectAttempts()
      Returns:
      the number of times this Admin will attempt to reconnect to Redis before giving up

    • recoverFromException

      protected void recoverFromException(String channel, Exception e)
      Handle an exception that was thrown from inside AdminImpl.PubSubListener.onMessage(String,String).
      Parameters:
      channel - the name of the channel that was being processed when the exception was thrown
      e - the exception that was thrown
